params.name: text_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize ChineseCLIPTextConfig.

params.name: vision_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize ChineseCLIPVisionConfig.

params.name: projection_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of text and vision projection layers.

params.name: logit_scale_init_value
params.description: The initial value of the logit_scale parameter. Default is used as per the original ChineseCLIPimplementation.
